name: io.cordova.hellocordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.plugin: cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-casai --nosave --verbose && cordova plugin add ../cordova-plugin-casai --link --save --verbose
scripts.android: cordova platform rm android --nosave && cordova platform add android && cordova prepare android --verbose
scripts.ios: cordova platform rm ios --nosave && cordova platform add ios && cordova prepare ios --verbose

author: Apache Cordova Team

cordova-plugin-casai.IOS_USER_TRACKING_USAGE: Your data will remain confidential and will only be used to provide you a better and personalised ad experience
